articles.title: Senior party officials visit Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex
DPRK remains unfazed under any situation
articles.content:
Senior party officials visit Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex 
    Ranam, December 4 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the provincial, city and county committees and complex committees of the Workers' Party of Korea across the country Tuesday visited the Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex where the torchlight of Ranam, the torchlight for effecting a new great upswing, was lit.
 The workers and officials of the complex settled the very urgent problems of fuel and raw materials on their own efforts during the "arduous march" and the forced march to produce good quality steel. They also manufactured up-to-date equipment requiring high technology by introducing a new engineering method and built two factories while ensuring the production of modern mining equipment.   
 Looking round different places of the complex, they were deeply impressed to see the workers of Ranam translating leader Kim Jong Il's plan for building a powerful nation into reality in the steadfast spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the spirit of devotedly implementing his instructions.
